response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our exclusive product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your growth. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it aligns well with your needs and expectations.

Considering the substantial worth of this product to us, we are offering it to you at an exceptional price of $950,000. This represents a strategic opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, potentially saving your company considerable resources compared to market prices.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. We are here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transition into your operations.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
